medium: 1 negative : glass ; 4 x 5 in. or smaller
title: Maybe the Jackson Day dinner invitation. Washington, D.C., Jan. 3. They could be discussing the invitation Senator Warren R. Austin, right, Republican of Vermont and Senate Minority Leader, received for the Jackson Day dinner. At any rate, Senator George L. Radcliff, left, and Senator Austin seem to be enjoying the ride on the Senate subway to the Capitol today for the opening session
